section.title: Tested Plugins
section.p: One thing about the 1.4 beta 3 plugin is that it allows a signed jar to be loaded and the proper authority is prompted for the certificate. Once accepted the certificate is then saved thus saving the deployment, installation and importing of keys/signatures to each of the desktops. Very Very nice.

section.p:
There are to applet html files that are included:
